name: Abou El Sid
description: Abou El Sid is a popular restaurant serving authentic Egyptian cuisine in a traditional setting with antique decor. The restaurant offers a comprehensive menu of classic Egyptian dishes prepared according to traditional recipes.

name: Koshary Abou Tarek
description: Koshary Abou Tarek is a famous restaurant specializing in Egypt's national dish, koshari. This multi-story establishment is known for serving one of the best versions of this popular street food in Cairo.

name: Sofra Restaurant
description: Sofra Restaurant is set in a restored 1930s house with traditional decor. It offers authentic Egyptian cuisine with a focus on Upper Egyptian specialties, served in a charming atmosphere with rooftop seating.

name: Fish Market
description: Fish Market is a popular seafood restaurant with a unique concept where customers select their fresh seafood by weight and choose how they want it prepared. Located on the Nile with panoramic views of the river.

name: El Kebabgy
location: Sofitel Cairo El Gezirah, 3 El Thawra Council Street, Cairo
description: El Kebabgy is a high-end restaurant specializing in traditional Egyptian grilled meats and kebabs. Located in the Sofitel Cairo El Gezirah hotel, it offers outdoor seating with stunning views of the Nile.

name: Felfela
description: Felfela is a long-standing restaurant serving traditional Egyptian cuisine in a quirky, jungle-like setting. Popular with both locals and tourists, it offers a wide range of authentic dishes at reasonable prices.

name: Aish Baladi
description: Aish Baladi offers a contemporary take on traditional Egyptian cuisine, using fresh, local ingredients. The restaurant has a modern, stylish interior and focuses on healthy, authentic Egyptian dishes with a creative twist.

name: Al-Khal Egyptian Restaurant
description: Al-Khal is a popular restaurant in Sharm El Sheikh serving authentic Egyptian cuisine. The restaurant offers a traditional atmosphere with Bedouin-style seating areas and live music in the evenings.

name: Osmanly Restaurant
location: Kempinski Nile Hotel, Garden City, Cairo
description: Osmanly Restaurant offers a refined dining experience featuring Ottoman and Egyptian cuisine. Located in the luxurious Kempinski Nile Hotel, it provides elegant surroundings and Nile views.

name: El Dokka
description: El Dokka is a charming restaurant on the Luxor Corniche offering traditional Egyptian and Nubian cuisine. The restaurant features outdoor seating with views of the Nile and serves authentic dishes from Upper Egypt.
